Merge pull request #64 from RedHatBrand/add-sass-helper-functions

Add sass helper functions

Thanks for this @castastrophe ,  I wasn't sure if this should live in the project repo or not, since many people seeking the webfont may not be using scss.  But, it's a way cleaner setup that I would have written,  super helpful for those who need it,  and not hard to trim-out either. 

Thanks a heap,
Merged!

Merge pull request #43 from hakimel/patch-1

Fix reference to regular italic in web font CSS
oops missing ttf files

Fix reference to regular italic in web font CSS

The web font CSS was referring to font files with the name `overpass-regular-italic` but those doesn't exist. I assume it's supposed to point to the `overpass-italic` files.

Merge pull request #40 from m4rc1e/3.002

Updated version number   - Thanks!
desktop-fonts | webfonts | source: Updated Roman and Italic version number to v3.002 and mono to v1.002

vertical metrics fixed
https://github.com/RedHatBrand/Overpass/issues/37

Adjustments to Overpass and Overpass Mono vertical metrics to eliminate clipping of bitmaps in Windows by harmonizing yMax and yMin values with winAscent and winDescent values.
Minor adjustments to horizontal metrics (kerning and spacing) to accommodate corrections to metrics in Heavy weights.
Added masters for Heavy and Heavy Italic to accommodate outline revisions
